# This file was generated by gr_modtool, a tool from the GNU Radio framework
# This file is a part of gr-mvdr_test
#
# SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
#

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
# Find Armadillo library
find_package(Armadillo REQUIRED)
include_directories(${ARMADILLO_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Find MATLAB library
set(MATLAB_DIR /usr/local/MATLAB/R2022b)
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES("${MATLAB_DIR}/extern/include")
LINK_DIRECTORIES("${MATLAB_DIR}/bin/glnxa64")
LINK_LIBRARIES("${MATLAB_DIR}/bin/glnxa64/libeng.so" "${MATLAB_DIR}/bin/glnxa64/libmx.so" "${MATLAB_DIR}/bin/glnxa64/libmat.so")

include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND mvdr_test_sources
    mvdr_impl.cc
)

set(mvdr_test_sources "${mvdr_test_sources}" matlab.cpp matlab.h matStruct.h)
if(NOT mvdr_test_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT mvdr_test_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-mvdr_test SHARED ${mvdr_test_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-mvdr_test ${ARMADILLO_LIBRARIES} gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-mvdr_test
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-mvdr_test PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_mvdr_test_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-mvdr_test PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-mvdr_test)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_mvdr_test_sources
qa_mvdr.cc
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-mvdr_test)

if(NOT test_mvdr_test_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_mvdr_test_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_mvdr_test_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("mvdr_test_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
